name: UIPressesEvent
desc: An event that describes the state of a set of physical buttons that are available to the device, such as those on an associated remote or game controller.

items.name: var allPresses: Set<UIPress>
items.desc: Returns the state of all physical buttons in the event.

items.name: func presses(for: UIGestureRecognizer) -> Set<UIPress>
items.desc: Returns the state of all physical buttons in the event that are associated with a particular gesture recognizer.
